TopicTitle: The Request Area - Request what I draw!

Articles.Content:
Heres how it works:

You ask me to draw (bla bla bla) and ill draw that.

You will be randomly drawn from these.

Example:

Player 1: Draw (bla bla bla)

Player 2: Draw (bla bla bla)

and say that theres 10 requests,so I randomly draw:

Me: 8! Or any others.

My Work:

ONLY 1 PIECE!

Lets take some requests!

Draw Jeb, Bill and Bob under a tree having a picnic on Laythe, complete with picnic cloth, sandwiches, drinks, jam etc, Jool in the sky and their spaceship nearby.

Edited June 10, 2013 by Custard Donut (In Space)
Draw Jeb smashing a big red button yelling "FIRE ZE MISSILES!" with 20 SRBS flying everywhere.

Draw Jeb smashing a big red button yelling "FIRE ZE MISSILES!" with 20 SRBS flying everywhere.

Okay,I actually LOVE this.

Draw Jeb, Bill and Bob under a tree having a picnic on Laythe, complete with picnic cloth, sandwiches, drinks, jam etc, Jool in the sky and their spaceship nearby.

Bonus if you have one of them trying to eat with their helmet on!

(They didn't think to put on their specialised Laythe suit.)

What painting software do you use? I like your drawing.

Oh yeah, my suggestion...

A kerbal that just landed on the mun, standing at the right of his flag, looking at the Kerbinrise on the horizon. (It should feel like he's lonely, but extremely happy).

I'd do it, but I'm new to GIMP and don't know how to use it.
Draw Jeb Kerman gazing upwards at Duna.
I use Gimp,and @Holo I don't know where he is looking at it FROM? Kerbin? Ike?

Draw Jeb smashing a big red button yelling "FIRE ZE MISSILES!" with 20 SRBS flying everywhere.

CONGRATULATIONS! YOU HAVE WON! (Dont worry others,2 of yours will be picked to be in the next one!)
The 3 kerbals watching Kerbol implode while flying a feew interplanetary ships full of kerbals.
Jeb fighting the Space Kraken in orbit around Jool with Bop in the background.
Or mabye some Kerbals crashing a ship on Duna.

How about: A clearly mentaly ill kerbal scientist jumpstarting piece of experimental equipment by putting two powercables togheter using a risky method- By biting down on both of them at the same time. Bzzzzzt!!!

Or a wackily deranged kerbal engineer digging through a scrap pile for usable parts. Behind him lies a small pile of his findings on a trolley.
